statements: SELECT * FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency
SELECT device_id, efficiency_rating, research_group FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency
SELECT designer_name, efficiency_rating, manufacture_date FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency
SELECT device_id, material_used FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency WHERE efficiency_rating >= 0.9
SELECT * FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency WHERE designer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8
SELECT device_id, manufacture_date, efficiency_rating FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency WHERE material_used = 'Graphene' ORDER BY manufacture_date DESC
SELECT designer_name, research_group FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency WHERE efficiency_rating BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7 ORDER BY designer_name ASC, research_group DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices, AVG(efficiency_rating) AS avg_rating FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency WHERE manufacture_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT material_used FROM NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency ORDER BY material_used ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM efficiency_performance;
SELECT device_name, performance FROM efficiency_performance WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT MAX(efficiency) AS highest_efficiency FROM efficiency_performance;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, efficiency, performance FROM efficiency_performance WHERE performance > 0.5 ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_performance WHERE efficiency > 0.8 AND performance < 0.5
SELECT device_name, efficiency FROM efficiency_performance ORDER BY efficiency DESC
SELECT * FROM research_project WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT project_name, researcher_name FROM research_project WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT device_id, performance FROM efficiency_performance WHERE efficiency BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, efficiency FROM devices WHERE efficiency > 0.5;
SELECT device_name, performance FROM devices ORDER BY performance DESC;
SELECT AVG(efficiency) AS avg_efficiency, AVG(performance) AS avg_performance FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, researcher, experiment_date FROM research_data WHERE researcher='John Doe';
SELECT devices.device_id, devices.device_name, research_data.researcher, research_data.results FROM devices JOIN research_data ON devices.device_id = research_data.device_id
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY device_id DESC

SELECT devices.device_name AS device, research_data.researcher AS researcher FROM devices JOIN research_data ON devices.device_id = research_data.device_id WHERE research_data.experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'

SELECT devices.device_name, research_data.researcher, research_facilities.location FROM devices JOIN research_data ON devices.device_id = research_data.device_id JOIN research_facilities ON research_facilities.facility_id = 1

SELECT devices.device_id, devices.efficiency, research_data.researcher, research_facilities.facility_name FROM devices JOIN research_data ON devices.device_id = research_data.device_id JOIN research_facilities ON research_facilities.facility_id = research_data.facility_id GROUP BY devices.device_id HAVING AVG(devices.efficiency) > 0.7
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyMetrics LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, efficiency, performance FROM EfficiencyMetrics ORDER BY efficiency DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM DeviceSpecs WHERE nanoscale_technology = 'advanced';
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM DeviceSpecs ORDER BY year ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM ResearchProjects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyMetrics WHERE performance > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, efficiency, performance FROM EfficiencyMetrics WHERE efficiency < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT em.device_id, em.efficiency, ds.manufacturer, ds.model FROM EfficiencyMetrics em JOIN DeviceSpecs ds ON em.device_id = ds.device_id WHERE em.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY em.efficiency DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT rp.project_name, COUNT(da.device_id) AS total_devices FROM ResearchProjects rp LEFT JOIN DeviceAssignments da ON rp.project_id = da.project_id GROUP BY rp.project_name HAVING total_devices > 3 ORDER BY total_devices DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ds.manufacturer, ds.model, da.assigned_date FROM DeviceSpecs ds JOIN DeviceAssignments da ON ds.device_id = da.device_id WHERE da.assigned_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY da.assigned_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM efficiency;
SELECT device_name, efficiency_score FROM efficiency WHERE efficiency_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM performance ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT device_name, performance_rating FROM performance WHERE performance_rating < 4;
SELECT device_name, supplier_name, device_type FROM nano_devices WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT * FROM efficiency ORDER BY device_name DESC, efficiency_score ASC;
SELECT device_name, performance_rating FROM performance WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT research_topic FROM research WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT device_name, supplier_name, device_type FROM nano_devices WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%' AND device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT measurement_date, measurement_result FROM measurements WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
